sn46.21:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn46.21:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn46.21:5.3: “‘Bodhāya saṃvattantī’ti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā bojjhaṅgāti vuccanti.
sn46.21:5.4: Idha, bhikkhu, satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ … pe …
sn46.21:5.5: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
